charset,UTF-8
descript
{
version,1
maxwidth,300
collision-sort,ascend
animation-sort,ascend
}
sakura.cursor
{
mouseup0,bust,system:hand
mousedown0,bust,system:grip
}
sakura.tooltips
{
bust,むねだよ
}
surface0
{
point.centerx,0
point.centery,0
point.kinoko.centerx,0

point.basepos.x,0
point.basepos.y,0

sakura.balloon.offsety,0
balloon.offsetx,0
balloon.offsety,0
element0,overlay,surface0.png,0,0
element1,overlayfast,surface1000.png,30,50

animation0.option,exclusive

animation0.pattern1,overlay,1002,125,40,55
animation0.pattern2,overlay,-1
animation0.collision0,40,55,75,70,mabuta

collisionex2,kata,ellipse,80,100,90,110
}
